text: @SenSchumer Why were Covid-19 infected patients sent to nursing homes instead of 100’s of unused beds at the 2 temporary hospitals at the Javits Center & the Navy’s USNS Comfort hospital?Gov. Cuomo’s handling of the nursing homes has been a disaster,1000’s of lives lost bc of his policies.
